{"id":548983786,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1630692436,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"37 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/548983786/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int sum = 0;\n        for(auto i : nums)\n            sum += i;\n        \n        int count = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++)\n        {\n            int x = sum - nums[i];\n            if((count == x / 2) && x % 2 == 0)\n                return i;\n            \n            else \n                count += nums[i];\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
